mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (store_id, member_id, status, order_date, take_in_out, total_price) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{memberId}, #{status}, #{orderDate}, #{takeInOut}, #{totalPrice})
INSERT INTO order_item (order_id, menu_id, quantity, price, menu_name) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{menuId}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{menuName})
mapper.select: SELECT oi.order_item_id, oi.order_id, oi.menu_id, oi.quantity, oi.price, m.menu_name FROM order_item oi JOIN menu m ON oi.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId}
